pageTitle: Bank or building society account details
heading: Bank or building society account details
summary: We will only use this to pay you any benefit you're entitled to. We will not share your account details with anyone else.
details: If you do not have your own bank account, we can use the account of a trusted family member or friend.
hint: If you have more than one job, you will be asked about your other jobs later.

accountName.label: Name of account holder
accountName.hint: Enter the name as it appears on your bank card, cheque book or statement.

errors.required: Enter the name of the account holder
errors.consecSpaces: The name of the account holder must not contain consecutive spaces
errors.consecOther: The name of the account holder must not contain consecutive characters other than letters or numbers
errors.startAndEndFormat: The name of the account holder must start and end with a letter or number
errors.startFormat: The name of the account holder must start with a letter or a number
errors.endFormat: The name of the account holder must end with a letter or a number

errors.required: Enter the bank or building society name

errors.notNum: The sort code must contain only numbers
errors.badLength: The sort code must contain 6 digits

errors.notNum: The account number must contain only numbers
errors.badLength: The account number must contain 8 digits

rollNumber.label: Building society roll number (if you have one)
rollNumber.hint: You can find it on your card, statement or passbook.

errors.badFormat: The building society roll or reference number must contain only letters, numbers, full stops, hyphens, apostrophes or forward slashes
